basics.name: Luis Medina
basics.label: Frontend Engineer
basics.summary: I like to contribute in Open Source World!
basics.skill: Developer passionate to learning new technologies

highlights: Improved client development workflow by incorpating modern tools like: React, Style Components, Redux, Authentication, React Native, Express.

As a Front End Developer, I developed with my team a app with react native for both platforms IOS and Android, I developed some parts of UI with functionality and some authentication with tokens, I implemented some services in the front-end, for the tasks and features I used jira and bit bucket for manage agile and software development.
work.highlightsSecond: Currently working, technologies I use React Native with CLI, Spring Boot, this app is for Ipad iOS and Tablet Android, for Continuous Deployment we use App Center
